actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to eliminate certain provisions of such Act relating to coercive practices affecting broadcasting.

summary.text: Repeals the prohibition against certain coercive practices affecting broadcasting in the Communications Act of 1934.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to eliminate certain provisions of such Act relating to coercive practices affecting broadcasting.
